column5: HOUSTON WE HAVE A PROBLEM **NASA VOICE**  Congrats, Look no further! You have found the home that you have been looking for. Located right in the HEART of Houston. This LOCATION alone makes this home that much more worth it. MIDTOWN is where the energy flows! It's THE hottest spot of Houston, featuring diverse tastes of different restaurants to the extravagant city night life. Whether you are here for pure entertainment, a romantic date, or just for a peaceful place to work. We have it all!
